meanings.sent1: The torn shirt was patchable, so I sewed a new piece of fabric onto it.
meanings.sent2: The patchable tire was quickly fixed by adding a small patch to cover the hole.
meanings.sent3: The patchable boat had so many patches, it looked like a colorful quilt floating on the water.
meanings.sent4: Her heart, though broken, remained patchable, ready to be mended with love and care.
meanings.sent5: The patchable roof leaked in so many places that it resembled a sieve during the rainstorm.

meanings.definition: Able to be repaired with a patch.
meanings.sent1: The patchable jeans were saved from being thrown away by adding a denim patch.
meanings.sent2: The patchable tent was quickly fixed with a waterproof patch to keep the rain out.
meanings.sent3: The patchable balloon had so many patches that it looked like a colorful mosaic in the sky.
meanings.sent4: His reputation, though damaged, remained patchable with sincere apologies and good deeds.
meanings.sent5: The patchable tire held air only because of the patch, resembling a warrior with a shield in battle.
